question_text: Which statement best describes the CIE1931 color space?
answer_options: It defines the specific color limits of all modern display panels
It is a triangle of RGB-defined values optimized for Adobe RGB
It encompasses all colors visible to the average human eye
It is used exclusively in OLED manufacturing
correct_answer: It encompasses all colors visible to the average human eye
explanation: The CIE1931 diagram is a foundational reference used to define how other color spaces relate to human vision.
